post.content: Ahh, the things you find when idly surfing the net. For those not hip to the HTML language, those two lines are the closing tag of the head segment (where stuff like the title of the page is set) and the opening tag of the body segment (the content of the page). It’s not something I personally would do (I’m not a fan of neck tattoos in general), but it’s still pretty funny in a geeky way :).
post.title: Funny Tattoo
